attributes.action: A NEIGHBOURS CCTV MUST NOT BE FILMING YOUR PROPERTY
attributes.additional_details:
At the moment it is legal for a neighbour to have CCTV pointed on your property, even if you have children!!
This is ridiculous and needs addressing especially how things are in todays society.
It is a total invasion of privacy, makes you feel uncomfortable, self-conscious and suspicious as to why they are filming yourself and your children!!!
